item.title: R基础循环练习题
item.description: R循环的几个练习题 1. Divisible by Ten 2.Greetings 3. Delete Starting Even Numbers 4. Odd Indices 5. Exponents R循环的几个练习题 有兴趣的同学可以把答案发给我。1. Divisible by Ten Create a function named first_func() that takes a list of numbers named nums as a parameter. Return the count of how many numbers in the list are divisible by 10. first_func(c(0, 25, 30, 35, 40) 测试输出 first_func <- function(num){ count = 0 # 初始化 for (i in num ){ if (i %% 10 == 0){ count = count +1 } } return(count) } first_func(c(0, 25, 30, 35, 40)) ## [1] 3 2.
